```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(rnoaa)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

```

```{r}
# Get a list of all NY station IDs
data("instacart") 

data_insta = instacart |>
  drop_na() |>
  select(order_id,reordered,order_number,order_dow,order_hour_of_day,aisle,department, )
  
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A
```{r}
data_insta |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~department, y = ~order_number, color = ~department, 
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )

data_insta |>
  plot_ly(
    x = ~department, y = ~order_dow, color = ~department, 
    type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )
```


### Chart C
```{r}
data_insta |> 
  count(department) |> 
  mutate(department = fct_reorder(department, n)) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~department, y = ~n, 
    type = "bar")
```
